entry.title: Genetic ancestry manuscript accepted at NeuroOncology!

link.title: Genetic ancestry manuscript accepted at NeuroOncology!

entry.content: Our newest manuscript, “Genetic ancestry superpopulations show distinct prevalence and outcomes across pediatric central nervous system tumors from the PBTA and PNOC”, work led by Dr. Ryan Corbett, has been accepted in NeuroOncology!
entry.summary: Our newest manuscript, “Genetic ancestry superpopulations show distinct prevalence and outcomes across pediatric central nervous system tumors from the PBTA and PNOC”, work led by Dr. Ryan Corbett, has been accepted in NeuroOncology!

entry.title: Rokita Lab opens at Children’s National Hospital

link.title: Rokita Lab opens at Children’s National Hospital

entry.content:
We are thrilled to announce the opening of the Rokita Lab at Children’s National within the Brain Tumor Institute (BTI) and Center for Cancer and Immunology Research (CCIR)! Situated in a leading pediatric institution, our lab is equipped with cutting-edge technology and resources, fostering a collaborative environment for groundbreaking discoveries. We’re excited to accelerate our research and expand our efforts to improve outcomes for children with brain cancer.

We are immediately hiring bioinformatics scientists to join our lab!
entry.summary: We are thrilled to announce the opening of the Rokita Lab at Children’s National within the Brain Tumor Institute (BTI) and Center for Cancer and Immunology Research (CCIR)! We’re excited to accelerate our research and expand our efforts to improve outcomes for children with brain cancer.
